TCAccountInitStrings.Error_DisplayNameTooLong: Display name cannot be more than 16 characters
TCAccountInitStrings.Error_DisplayNameTooShort: Display name must be at least 3 characters
TCAccountInitStrings.Error_TaglineTooLong: Tagline cannot be more than 8 characters
TCAccountInitStrings.Error_TooManyAttempts: Too many attempts, try again later
TCAccountInitStrings.Notification_HealthyGamingAdvisory: Healthy gaming advisory. Don't play pirated games. Be careful not to fall prey to scams. Moderate gaming benefits the brain, but excessive gaming can be harmful to health. Manage your time responsibly and enjoy a healthy life.
TCAccountInitStrings.Error_PlatformConnectionFailed: There was an error connecting to the platform. Please restart your game client.
TCAccountInitStrings.InitScreen_FriendsAndFamily: Thanks for joining the Project A friends & family alpha! Everything is still a WIP. Please don’t leak us!
TCAccountInitStrings.CopyrightRiotGames: © 2020 Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games, VALORANT, and any associated logos are trademarks, service marks, and/or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc.
TCAccountInitStrings.LoginQueue_Queued: We are currently experiencing an unusually large number of players. To keep everything running smoothly, we need you to hold on for just a moment.
